content.webTitle: Cricket: Ryan Sidebottom to miss one-day internationals with achilles injury

fields.headline: Sidebottom out of one-dayers with achilles injury
fields.bodyText: The seam bowler Ryan Sidebottom will miss the limited-overs leg of England's tour of the West Indies because of an achilles tendon injury. Kent's Amjad Khan, who is making his debut in the ongoing fifth Test in Trinidad, will replace Sidebottom in the squad. Nottinghamshire's Sidebottom, 31, has struggled with injury for much of the past year. He took one wicket in his two Tests on this tour, in Jamaica and Barbados.
